インタフェースの使用
org.sxb.data.redis.serializer.RedisSerializer

  • RedisSerializerを使用しているパッケージ 
    パッケージ 説明
    org.sxb.data.redis.cache
    Package providing a Redis implementation for Spring cache abstraction.
    org.sxb.data.redis.connection
    Connection package providing low-level abstractions for interacting with the various Redis 'drivers'/libraries.
    org.sxb.data.redis.core
    Core package for integrating Redis with Spring concepts.
    org.sxb.data.redis.core.query
    Query package for Redis template.
    org.sxb.data.redis.core.script  
    org.sxb.data.redis.listener
    Base package for Redis message listener / pubsub container facility
    org.sxb.data.redis.listener.adapter
    Message listener adapter package.
    org.sxb.data.redis.serializer
    Serialization/Deserialization package for converting Object to (and from) binary data.

    • org.sxb.data.redis.cacheでのRedisSerializerの使用

      RedisSerializer型のパラメータを持つorg.sxb.data.redis.cacheのメソッド 
      修飾子とタイプ メソッドと説明
      void RedisCacheKey.setSerializer(RedisSerializer<?> serializer)
      Set the RedisSerializer used for converting the key into its Byte representation.
      RedisCacheKey RedisCacheKey.withKeySerializer(RedisSerializer serializer)
      Use RedisSerializer for converting the key into its Byte representation.

      Constructs a new DefaultStringRedisConnection instance.

      Returns the hashValueSerializer.

      RedisSerializer<?> RedisTemplate.getKeySerializer()
      Returns the key serializer used by this template.
      RedisSerializer<?> RedisOperations.getKeySerializer() 
      RedisSerializer<java.lang.String> RedisTemplate.getStringSerializer()
      Returns the stringSerializer.
      RedisSerializer<?> RedisTemplate.getValueSerializer()
      Returns the value serializer used by this template.
      RedisSerializer<?> RedisOperations.getValueSerializer() 
      RedisSerializer型のパラメータを持つorg.sxb.data.redis.coreのメソッド 
      修飾子とタイプ メソッドと説明
      java.util.List<java.lang.Object> RedisTemplate.exec(RedisSerializer<?> valueSerializer) 
      java.util.List<java.lang.Object> RedisOperations.exec(RedisSerializer<?> valueSerializer)
      Execute a transaction, using the provided RedisSerializer to deserialize any results that are byte[]s or Collections of byte[]s.
      <T> T RedisTemplate.execute(RedisScript<T> script, RedisSerializer<?> argsSerializer, RedisSerializer<T> resultSerializer, java.util.List<K> keys, java.lang.Object... args) 
      <T> T RedisTemplate.execute(RedisScript<T> script, RedisSerializer<?> argsSerializer, RedisSerializer<T> resultSerializer, java.util.List<K> keys, java.lang.Object... args) 
      <T> T RedisOperations.execute(RedisScript<T> script, RedisSerializer<?> argsSerializer, RedisSerializer<T> resultSerializer, java.util.List<K> keys, java.lang.Object... args)
      Executes the given RedisScript, using the provided RedisSerializers to serialize the script arguments and result.
      <T> T RedisOperations.execute(RedisScript<T> script, RedisSerializer<?> argsSerializer, RedisSerializer<T> resultSerializer, java.util.List<K> keys, java.lang.Object... args)
      Executes the given RedisScript, using the provided RedisSerializers to serialize the script arguments and result.
      java.util.List<java.lang.Object> RedisTemplate.executePipelined(RedisCallback<?> action, RedisSerializer<?> resultSerializer) 
      java.util.List<java.lang.Object> RedisOperations.executePipelined(RedisCallback<?> action, RedisSerializer<?> resultSerializer)
      Executes the given action object on a pipelined connection, returning the results using a dedicated serializer.
      java.util.List<java.lang.Object> RedisTemplate.executePipelined(SessionCallback<?> session, RedisSerializer<?> resultSerializer) 
      java.util.List<java.lang.Object> RedisOperations.executePipelined(SessionCallback<?> session, RedisSerializer<?> resultSerializer)
      Executes the given Redis session on a pipelined connection, returning the results using a dedicated serializer.
      void RedisTemplate.setDefaultSerializer(RedisSerializer<?> serializer)
      Sets the default serializer to use for this template.
      void RedisTemplate.setHashKeySerializer(RedisSerializer<?> hashKeySerializer)
      Sets the hash key (or field) serializer to be used by this template.
      void RedisTemplate.setHashValueSerializer(RedisSerializer<?> hashValueSerializer)
      Sets the hash value serializer to be used by this template.
      void RedisTemplate.setKeySerializer(RedisSerializer<?> serializer)
      Sets the key serializer to be used by this template.
      void RedisTemplate.setStringSerializer(RedisSerializer<java.lang.String> stringSerializer)
      Sets the string value serializer to be used by this template (when the arguments or return types are always strings).
      void RedisTemplate.setValueSerializer(RedisSerializer<?> serializer)
      Sets the value serializer to be used by this template.
      <T,S> java.util.List<T> RedisTemplate.sort(SortQuery<K> query, BulkMapper<T,S> bulkMapper, RedisSerializer<S> resultSerializer) 
      <T,S> java.util.List<T> RedisOperations.sort(SortQuery<K> query, BulkMapper<T,S> bulkMapper, RedisSerializer<S> resultSerializer) 
      <T> java.util.List<T> RedisTemplate.sort(SortQuery<K> query, RedisSerializer<T> resultSerializer) 
      <T> java.util.List<T> RedisOperations.sort(SortQuery<K> query, RedisSerializer<T> resultSerializer)

    • org.sxb.data.redis.listener.adapterでのRedisSerializerの使用

      修飾子とタイプ メソッドと説明
      void MessageListenerAdapter.setSerializer(RedisSerializer<?> serializer)
      Set the serializer that will convert incoming raw Redis messages to listener method arguments.
      void MessageListenerAdapter.setStringSerializer(RedisSerializer<java.lang.String> serializer)
      Sets the serializer used for converting the channel/pattern to a String.

    • org.sxb.data.redis.serializerでのRedisSerializerの使用

      RedisSerializerを実装しているorg.sxb.data.redis.serializerのクラス 
      修飾子とタイプ クラスと説明
      class  GenericToStringSerializer<T>
      Generic String to byte[] (and back) serializer.
      class  Jackson2JsonRedisSerializer<T>
      RedisSerializer that can read and write JSON using Jackson's and Jackson Databind ObjectMapper.
      class  JdkSerializationRedisSerializer
      Java Serialization Redis serializer.
      class  StringRedisSerializer
      Simple String to byte[] (and back) serializer.
      RedisSerializer型のパラメータを持つorg.sxb.data.redis.serializerのメソッド 
      修飾子とタイプ メソッドと説明
      static <T> java.util.Collection<T> SerializationUtils.deserialize(java.util.Collection<byte[]> rawValues, RedisSerializer<T> redisSerializer) 
      static <T> java.util.List<T> SerializationUtils.deserialize(java.util.List<byte[]> rawValues, RedisSerializer<T> redisSerializer) 
      static <HK,HV> java.util.Map<HK,HV> SerializationUtils.deserialize(java.util.Map<byte[],byte[]> rawValues, RedisSerializer<HK> hashKeySerializer, RedisSerializer<HV> hashValueSerializer) 
      static <HK,HV> java.util.Map<HK,HV> SerializationUtils.deserialize(java.util.Map<byte[],byte[]> rawValues, RedisSerializer<HK> hashKeySerializer, RedisSerializer<HV> hashValueSerializer) 
      static <T> java.util.Map<T,T> SerializationUtils.deserialize(java.util.Map<byte[],byte[]> rawValues, RedisSerializer<T> redisSerializer) 
      static <T> java.util.Set<T> SerializationUtils.deserialize(java.util.Set<byte[]> rawValues, RedisSerializer<T> redisSerializer)
